advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.releaseNotes:
新增中国风DLC——大圣游记
修复了 iOS 17 及更早版本的问题。
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===

比以往任何时候都更具威胁和力量，王国保卫战5 带来了一种全新、令人兴奋的体验，以其前作的快节奏和引人入胜的玩法为基础，赢得了奖项的赞誉。

当一个强大的邪恶势力在王国上空出现时，一个意想不到的联盟形成了——发动终极塔防战役，用两支军队中最精锐的力量来保卫整个王国和领域！虽然他们暂时并肩作战，但临时联盟内部典型的纷争可能会改变后续冒险的走向。

准备好释放双英雄的强大力量，在塔防战斗中扭转战局吧！
没错，现在你可以同时控制两条龙！双倍的喷火乐趣，双倍的混乱——只要确保他们不会因为谁能囤积更多的金子争吵！

所有重量级角色如圣骑士、弓箭手、法师、死灵法师等等都听你指挥。但要注意，他们可能会开始争论谁是队伍中的真正英雄，而敌人却悄悄溜过去！ 
你准备好迎接终极对决了吗？和利尼维亚的勇敢战士们以及不屈不挠的黑暗军团，踏上征服一个巨大敌人的史诗旅程。  

游戏特色：
招募34名独特的英雄和防御塔！

- 18个精英防御塔的建造和升级
骑士顶在最前方、弓箭手百步穿杨、法师的奥术魔法、死灵法师的亡灵之力，甚至还有能召唤恶魔的深渊祭坛！——这些经典强力塔都将听从你的号令！

- 16个史诗英雄 - 将塔防战斗提升到新的水平
同时控制2名英雄去战斗！
准备见证最不可能的双英雄组合的强大威力！森林守护灵搭配钢铁傀儡？
时空法师携手“普通勇士”？看似离奇的搭档，也能爆发惊人威力！

- 6种不同地形，更有迷人的战场等你征服
保卫Kingdom Rush的多彩景观。穿越王国深林，甚至其危险的洞穴作战。

- 25个充满快节奏塔防战斗的战役阶段
在充满惊喜挑战和细节的异国地形中设定你的策略。
面对成群的不可预测的敌人和史诗般的boss战斗，将你的防御策略推向极限！

- 3种不同的游戏模式来测试你的实力
在取得胜利后，尝试以更具挑战性的方式玩每个阶段。谁不喜欢一个好的挑战呢？

- 58多个游戏成就在战斗中征服
没有诱人的奖励，史诗策略游戏算什么？展示你的技能，解锁奖励！

- 45种以上不同的敌人来测试你的塔防智慧
展现联盟的塔防战斗技能，对抗4个不同的敌人氏族。用独特的防御策略击败他们每一个！

- 当然…
有很多复活节彩蛋和Ironhide Game Studio一贯的轻松幽默。
因为没有一些隐藏的惊喜，策略游戏算什么呢？


--------
Ironhide的服务条款：https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService
Ironhide隐私政策：https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy

advisories: 频繁/强烈的卡通或幻想暴力
偶尔/轻微的惊悚或恐怖题材
cn.artistName: 厦门快爆游网络科技有限公司
cn.sellerName: Xiamen Kuaibaoyou Network Technology Co., Ltd
cn.releaseNotes:
1.支持手柄操作
2.修复了僵尸入侵模式下，部分关卡结算异常的情况
cn.description:
《破门而入：行动小队》是一款独具特色的2D反恐战术游戏，它将策略的深度与动作的爽快感完美结合。在游戏中，你需要指挥特警小队，在错综复杂的室内环境中直面各种致命威胁。

游戏主要体验在于：

风格迥异的作战成员：6位特警队员各自拥有专属的武器、技能与升级路线，无论是正面强攻还是隐秘行动，都能找到合适的执行者。配合超过60种枪械装备，战术组合千变万化。

拒绝线性的自由挑战：84个关卡无需按部就班，你可以根据任务情况自由选择挑战顺序。面对同一场景，亦可尝试多种通关思路，游戏没有唯一的正确答案。

持续不断的新鲜体验：完成主线任务后，“无尽高塔”模式提供了极高的随机性挑战，而“僵尸入侵”模式则让你在熟悉的战场上，用全新的方式对抗成群的僵尸。

总之，如果你渴望一款能真正让自己运筹帷幄的战术游戏，本作将是绝佳选择。

cn.releaseNotes: 添加：第2章-插入排序和归并排序添加描述文档；
cn.description:
参照原书第三版，内容包括：
    第2章 算法入门：插入排序，归并排序；
    第4章 分治法：最大子集问题，矩阵相乘算法[常规算法，分治法，Strassen算法]；
    第6章 堆排序：堆排序[大根堆，小根堆]；
    第7章 快速排序：快速排序；
    第8章 线性时间排序：计数排序；
    第12章 二叉搜索树：二叉搜索树[中序遍历，递归搜索，迭代搜索，迭代最小，迭代最大，后继，先驱，插入，删除]；
    第13章 红黑树：红黑树[插入，删除]；
    第15章 动态规划：切钢条问题[递归，自顶向下，自底向上，打印]，最长公共子序列；
    第16章 贪心算法：活动选择问题[递归，迭代]，Huffman编码；
    第22章 基本图算法：广度优先搜索，深度优先搜索，拓扑排序，强连通分量；
    第23章 最小生成树：最小生成树[Kruskal算法，Prim算法];
    第24章 单源最短路径：Bellman-Ford算法，有向无环图算法，Dijkstra算法；
    第25章 每对顶点间的最短路径：最短路径算法[Slow算法，Faster算法，Floyd-Warshall算法]；
    第26章 最大流：Ford-Fulkerson算法；
    附加内容：Hanoi塔问题，N皇后问题，排序算法性能比较；

主要特点有：
    可单步或连续运行伪码，观察参数和数据结构的变化，有助于理解算法的设计思想；
    可设置程序断点，方便观察算法的断点状态，通过循环不变式验证其正确性；
    提供运行时函数栈，并标记函数返回位置，可轻松跟踪递归函数的运行过程，并有助于理解计算机程序的运行机制；
    记录代码行执行次数，有助于理解算法的时间复杂度；

希望此App能对您学习算法和数据结构有所帮助；

hk.releaseNotes: 修復了遊戲中的一個錯誤。
hk.description:
變成日本的鐵路公司，挑戰世界上最繁忙的通勤高峰!

玩 "東京電車 "不需要任何鐵路知識。
這個遊戲是一個規則簡單的腦力遊戲，但需要大量的腦力。

顧客們在車站等待著火車的到來，把他們送到目的地。
啟動火車，運送你的顧客。

每一位登上火車的乘客，你都能賺到錢。
調整運行間隔和車廂數量，以達到最高收入。
發出列車要花錢。如果你發的火車太多，登車率下降，你將失去收入。

操作方法非常容易，規則也很簡單。
你所要做的就是調整火車車廂的數量，讓火車在最佳時間出發。
隨著遊戲的進行，快遞票價也會出現。

完全不需要技術知識。
喜歡火車的人和喜歡游戲的人都能很快理解並享受遊戲。

沒有應用內購買。沒有廣告。
請專注於遊戲。
在社交媒體上分享你的操作結果。

在台湾和日本鐵路線上駕駛電車並載客。

・簡單的益智遊戲
“東京電車２”是一款規則簡單的益智遊戲。無需專業知識。
火車迷，遊戲迷，人人都能享受。

・致所有將成為行動調度員的人
在日本的早晨，顧客們正在等待火車的到來去上班。
讓我們啟動火車並運送客戶。

- 遊戲目標
日本鐵路公司是營利性組織。讓我們以高營業利潤為目標吧！

・如何產生利潤
票價收入-出發成本=營業利潤。

票價收入是在車站的顧客登上火車時產生的。
示例）如果兩名乘客在票價為 20 的車站上車，他們將獲得 40。

發車費按發車時的車廂數收取。
示例）2 節車廂的火車為 30，4 節車廂的火車為 40，10 節車廂的火車為 70。


一個人可以乘坐一輛車。
票價收入是在乘客登上火車時產生的。
調整行駛距離和車輛數量以獲得最大利潤。
離境費用。如果你開的火車太多，而佔用率下降，你就會損失收入。

·操作方法
控制非常簡單，規則也很簡單。
你所要做的就是調整列車的車廂數量，讓列車在最佳時間出發。
隨著遊戲的進行，將會出現各種變化，例如特快列車和換乘站。

·體積
享受 50 多條路線。
請體驗日本鐵路公司的各種運輸策略。

- 沒有廣告，沒有計費
沒有應用內購買。無廣告。
請專心玩遊戲。孩子們可以安心地玩耍。
讓我們分享在 社交媒體 上駕駛的結果。

・鐵路玩
JR東日本、JR東海、JR西日本、JR九州、東武、東急、西武、京王、京急、京阪、阪急、阪神、近鐵、名鐵、小田急、南海、西鐵、相鐵、京成、東京地鐵、大阪地鐵、都營地鐵, 筑波快遞

・容量約130MB
存儲負擔也小。根本沒有繁重的處理。

hk.releaseNotes:
Bug fixes and 100+ new levels added.
Thanks to the loyal players for your valuable feedback!
hk.description:
Are you ready to become the ultimate screw master?

Welcome to Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood, the most addictive and fun screw puzzle game of the year! If you are a fan of logic puzzles, brain teasers, and the satisfying sound of wood, this game is made for you.

Dive into a world of challenging mechanics where your mission is simple yet tricky: unscrew the pins, remove the nuts and bolts, and clear the wood plates to solve the jam. It sounds easy, but as you progress, the levels become a true IQ test!

KEY FEATURES:

Engaging Gameplay: Enjoy the classic mechanic of nuts and bolts. Strategically unscrew the pins to make the wood bars fall.

Wood Theme & ASMR: Immerse yourself in the relaxing world of wood. Listen to the satisfying ASMR sounds of metal screws hitting the wooden board.

Brain Training: Hundreds of levels designed to boost your logic. From simple warm-ups to complex hard puzzles, challenge your mind every day.

Custom Skins: Unlock unique skins for your screws, nuts, and bolts. Customize your board for a fresh experience.

Global Leaderboard: Compete with friends and players worldwide to see who solves the screw jam the fastest.

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap to unscrew the nuts and bolts from the wood plates.

Move the screws to the empty holes strategically to avoid a pin jam.

Drop all the wood plates to clear the level and win rewards.

Use hints if you get stuck on a tricky screw puzzle.

Whether you want to relax after a long day or challenge your brain with a tough logic game, Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood is the perfect choice. Experience the thrill of solving the ultimate wood puzzle!

Download now and start unscrewing! Can you solve the jam?

advisories: 偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
偶爾/輕度的粗俗用語或低俗幽默
hk.releaseNotes:
- Buses now feature subtle animations
- Plate numbers are now harder, sometimes with only a single character changed. Stay sharp!
- Added new notification icons for construction, achievements, and guides.
- Fixed display issues on notched phones.
- Fixed the warning paper getting stuck on the screen.
- Fixed an issue where controls were unresponsive on the first launch.
- The Night Shift pop-up will now only appear once.
- Added new special "Cooler Names" to passports.
hk.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

hk.trackName: 聖經(和合本)(繁體中英對照)
hk.releaseNotes:
This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

支持新版本iOS. 可下載其他語言聖經(通過設置菜單可直接顯示或隱藏不同版本聖經)。用拼音加註選中中文並可讀出。
hk.description:
聖經(和合本)(繁體中英對照)
	Application contains traditional Chinese bible and English bible for reference reading.
	可自由選擇中英對照, 繁體中文或英文聖經閱讀.


請參考在PalReader 網站上的使用錄像來深入了解此應用程序.
閱讀程序具有以下先進功能:

專為iPhone 而做的存儲優化, 存儲相同的圖書比其它程序節省超過30%的空間.
全屏幕閱讀支持. LoudReader 只在用戶需要時顯示控制對話框, 而其它iPhone 閱讀程序顯示控制始終佔用寶貴的屏幕.
支持任意方向閱讀. 程序自動調整圖書顯示方式.
使用HTML顯示圖書的多種字體與圖像, 優於其它程序的單一字體文本顯示方式.
頁內捲動控制幫助讀者在長頁面內快速移動到任意位置.
直觀調整字體大小,顏色以及背景.
手指雙擊擊即可使用的章節選擇, 字體大小控制.
歷史記憶功能幫助用戶快速到任意章節或前後章節
準確回到上次閱讀位置(甚至包括上次卷滾條位置)

操作簡介

每一章為一長頁, 用手指拖動卷滾或輕擊頁面上部1/4或下部1/4進行向上或向下翻頁.
雙擊頁面即可彈出控制面板. 閱讀器的操作由這一個彈出式控制面板控制, 簡單直觀方便易用.
如希望快速在頁面內移動, 可用控制面板小滾輪選擇頁面位置百分比.
輕擊綠色的箭頭控制章節導航的後退和前進.
退出閱讀器時程序會自動記住最後的閱讀位置(甚至包括上次卷滾條位置), 下次進入閱讀器時程序直接打開到此處.
hk.trackCensoredName: 聖經(和合本)(繁體中英對照)

tw.description:
在台湾和日本鐵路線上駕駛電車並載客。

・簡單的益智遊戲
“東京電車２”是一款規則簡單的益智遊戲。無需專業知識。
火車迷，遊戲迷，人人都能享受。

・致所有將成為行動調度員的人
在日本的早晨，顧客們正在等待火車的到來去上班。
讓我們啟動火車並運送客戶。

- 遊戲目標
日本鐵路公司是營利性組織。讓我們以高營業利潤為目標吧！

・如何產生利潤
票價收入-出發成本=營業利潤。

票價收入是在車站的顧客登上火車時產生的。
示例）如果兩名乘客在票價為 20 的車站上車，他們將獲得 40。

發車費按發車時的車廂數收取。
示例）2 節車廂的火車為 30，4 節車廂的火車為 40，10 節車廂的火車為 70。


一個人可以乘坐一輛車。
票價收入是在乘客登上火車時產生的。
調整行駛距離和車輛數量以獲得最大利潤。
離境費用。如果你開的火車太多，而佔用率下降，你就會損失收入。

·操作方法
控制非常簡單，規則也很簡單。
你所要做的就是調整列車的車廂數量，讓列車在最佳時間出發。
隨著遊戲的進行，將會出現各種變化，例如特快列車和換乘站。

·體積
享受 50 多條路線。
請體驗日本鐵路公司的各種運輸策略。

- 沒有廣告，沒有計費
沒有應用內購買。無廣告。
請專心玩遊戲。孩子們可以安心地玩耍。
讓我們分享在 社交媒體 上駕駛的結果。

・鐵路玩
JR東日本、JR東海、JR西日本、JR九州、東武、東急、西武、京王、京急、京阪、阪急、阪神、近鐵、名鐵、小田急、南海、西鐵、相鐵、京成、東京地鐵、大阪地鐵、都營地鐵, 筑波快遞

・容量約130MB
存儲負擔也小。根本沒有繁重的處理。

tw.releaseNotes:
Bug fixes and 100+ new levels added.
Thanks to the loyal players for your valuable feedback!
tw.description:
Are you ready to become the ultimate screw master?

Welcome to Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood, the most addictive and fun screw puzzle game of the year! If you are a fan of logic puzzles, brain teasers, and the satisfying sound of wood, this game is made for you.

Dive into a world of challenging mechanics where your mission is simple yet tricky: unscrew the pins, remove the nuts and bolts, and clear the wood plates to solve the jam. It sounds easy, but as you progress, the levels become a true IQ test!

KEY FEATURES:

Engaging Gameplay: Enjoy the classic mechanic of nuts and bolts. Strategically unscrew the pins to make the wood bars fall.

Wood Theme & ASMR: Immerse yourself in the relaxing world of wood. Listen to the satisfying ASMR sounds of metal screws hitting the wooden board.

Brain Training: Hundreds of levels designed to boost your logic. From simple warm-ups to complex hard puzzles, challenge your mind every day.

Custom Skins: Unlock unique skins for your screws, nuts, and bolts. Customize your board for a fresh experience.

Global Leaderboard: Compete with friends and players worldwide to see who solves the screw jam the fastest.

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap to unscrew the nuts and bolts from the wood plates.

Move the screws to the empty holes strategically to avoid a pin jam.

Drop all the wood plates to clear the level and win rewards.

Use hints if you get stuck on a tricky screw puzzle.

Whether you want to relax after a long day or challenge your brain with a tough logic game, Screw Pin Jam Puzzle: Wood is the perfect choice. Experience the thrill of solving the ultimate wood puzzle!

Download now and start unscrewing! Can you solve the jam?

advisories: 偶而/輕微的酒精、菸草或藥物使用或相關內容
偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
偶而/輕微的粗話或低俗幽默
tw.releaseNotes:
- Buses now feature subtle animations
- Plate numbers are now harder, sometimes with only a single character changed. Stay sharp!
- Added new notification icons for construction, achievements, and guides.
- Fixed display issues on notched phones.
- Fixed the warning paper getting stuck on the screen.
- Fixed an issue where controls were unresponsive on the first launch.
- The Night Shift pop-up will now only appear once.
- Added new special "Cooler Names" to passports.
tw.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

us.trackCensoredName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.releaseNotes: -优化了「写给自己」语录库，并将该功能扩展至Watch端
us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

tr.releaseNotes:
Mayor Card 1.0.6 – Your Feedback Matters!
• A new player feedback screen has been added.
• Minor technical improvements for a smoother experience.
• With new balance adjustments, your town is now fairer and more fun!
tr.description:
RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES!
Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history!

Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you’re out of office—maintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city.

KEY FEATURES

• 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices—every decision is yours!
• Swipe & Decide – Instant control, deep consequence.
• Triple Balance System – People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green.
• Chain Cards – Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future.
• Adventure Cards – Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends.
• Character Stories – Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief… each NPC steers you to a different ending.
• Endless Replayability – Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new.


LAUNCH DISCOUNT — NOW LIVE!
Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

tr.description:
Differences from the free version:
- exclusive rain notification
- no Ads

Expect the Unexpected with this Beautiful and Easy-to-use Weather App

Accurate Minute to Minute Rainfall Forecast - When will the rain start and when is it going to stop? Know about the weather in advance and plan your day out properly!


Street-level accuracy: No more imprecise forecasts based on a national or city level! Your exclusive weather forecast for every block in the neighborhood is here!

Multiple Location Selections: Street-level accurate forecasts to keep an eye on your loved ones!


China Rainfall Map - We use the National Meteorological Radar to produce our accurate forecast. Just take a glimpse to know exactly where and how heavy the rain will be!


China Air Pollution Map - Is the pollution growing stronger or fading away? Where is it heading to? Just take a look at this map and get the answer to all of your questions!

Real-time satellite imagery
From the astronaut's point of view, tracing the flowing cloud and glittering days, and Help yourself judge the weather

Omni-directional weather map
Look at the evolution trend of precipitation, temperature, dew point temperature, humidity and visibility in the next two days.

Weather Feedback - If you feel that our forecast is not completely accurate, please tap the feedback button to help us improve!


------
A big thank you to the "Swarma Club" and our partners for their long-term and unfailing support!


Automatic renewal service:
1. Service name：svip auto-renew monthly, svip auto-renew annually.
2. Price：9 RMB / Month, 90 RMB / Year.
3. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
4. You can manually open the Apple mobile phone 'Settings' - > enter 'iTunes Store and App Store - > click 'Apple ID', select 'view Apple ID', enter the 'account settings' page, click 'subscription', select 'ColorfulClouds Pro continuous subscription', and cancel subscriptions to end it. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
5. Term of use: https://caiyunapp.com/h5/agreement/vipprotocal.html?ostype=ios_pro&lang=en_US
6. Privacy policy: https://caiyunapp.com/h5/agreement/privacy.html?ostype=ios_pro&lang=en_US

tr.description:
Bluff and raise, improve your skills, gain experience, make new friends and become the best poker player ever!

◆ Game features ◆

• FREE CHIPS – Play the game every day to get free chips!

• BOOST POKER TOURNAMENT – A Texas Hold'em tournament where you spin the reel for a chance of winning 15 billion chips! Boost your balance with this incredibly exciting game!

• SPECIAL MODES – Play Texas Hold'em with a twist: make super combinations with jokers, peek at your opponent's cards, play high cards only, get pocket pairs and much more!

• MTT TOURNAMENTS – The most popular offline tournaments are now available online! Defeat lots of worthy competitors at several tables to reach the final table!

• TOURNAMENTS – Participate in weekly Sit'n'Go tournaments, where you can WIN unique trophies or millions of chips and top our Leaderboard!

• CASINO GAMES – Enjoy a variety of casino games. Play blackjack, Omaha poker, roulette, baccarat, slots, video poker, craps, Split Bet Poker and Set Poker—all in one application!

• VIP LEVELS – Get huge bonuses and exclusive access to the latest in-game features!

• FAIR PLAY GUARANTEED – All our games use a Random Number Generator (RNG) and are certified by independent experts. We guarantee the best and fairest Texas Hold'em experience!

• CHAT WITH OTHER PLAYERS – Have even more fun at the casino tables with our convenient in-game chat, instant messenger and animated emoji. Discuss the hands played or share your emotions with your poker opponents and friends!

• REFERRAL SYSTEM – Invite your friends to play, everyone will get a reward!

• BUILD YOUR PROFILE – Share your successes with friends. Show off how many games you've played, your biggest wins, level, card collections, achievements, property and trophies!

• UNIQUE AVATAR – Create a one-of-a-kind look in the avatar editor.

• QUESTS – Complete daily quests to get free chips!

• EASY LEARN TO PLAY – Are you new to Texas Hold'em poker but always wanted to try it? Our simple-to-follow tutorial mode will help you take the first steps.

• NO REGISTRATION – Get straight into the action. Choose guest mode to use our free casino app without registering.

• SINGLE ACCOUNT – Play on different devices. Choose the authorization method that works best for you and start playing Texas Hold'em poker right away for free!

Subscribe to our social media pages and be the first to find out about our promotions and latest news!
Facebook: https://facebook.com/Pokerist
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pokeristclub
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/KamaGamesChannel
X: https://x.com/KamaCasino

This game is only available to users of legal age. The game offers no possibility of winning money or anything of value. Success in playing this game does not imply your success in a similar real-money casino game.

pt.releaseNotes:
Ônibus agora têm animações sutis

As placas de licença estão mais difíceis, às vezes com apenas um caractere alterado. Fique atento!

Novos ícones de notificação para construção, conquistas e guias.

Corrigidos problemas de exibição em celulares com entalhe (notch).

Corrigido o problema do aviso que ficava preso na tela.

Corrigido o problema de controles não responsivos no primeiro lançamento.

O pop-up “Turno Noturno” agora aparecerá apenas uma vez.

Adicionados novos “Nomes Mais Legais” especiais aos passaportes.
pt.description:
Já imaginou como é estar na linha da frente da segurança nacional?

Em Black Border 2, você assume o papel de um agente da Polícia de Fronteira, enfrentando situações desafiantes a cada turno. Com visuais detalhados e jogabilidade envolvente, este jogo oferece uma experiência realista incomparável que coloca você no centro da ação.

Assuma a responsabilidade de proteger as fronteiras do seu país contra o contrabando ilegal. Inspecione veículos, reveja documentos e enfrente contrabandistas que tentam traficar drogas, armas e outras mercadorias ilegais.

Cada dia traz novos desafios, onde pensamento rápido e visão aguçada são as suas melhores ferramentas. Você é mais do que um simples agente de fronteira — você é a última linha de defesa.

Funcionalidades de Black Border 2:

    Simulação autêntica de patrulha de fronteira: Coloque-se no papel de um verdadeiro agente, onde cada decisão conta e cada interação está carregada de tensão.

    Inspeção detalhada de documentos: Analise cuidadosamente passaportes, autorizações e outros documentos para decidir quem pode entrar e quem deve ser barrado.

    Deteção de contrabando: Realize buscas minuciosas em veículos e inspeções pessoais para capturar criminosos que tentam contrabandear mercadorias ilegais.

    Personagens dinâmicos com IA: Interaja com personagens realistas que reagem e se adaptam com base nas suas decisões e ações.

    Desafios crescentes: Desde pequenos erros em documentos até grandes redes de contrabando, enfrente missões cada vez mais intensas que vão testar os seus limites.
